name: stomping-tantrum
flavor_text: Driven by frustration, the user attacks the target. If the userâ€™s previous move has failed, the power of this move doubles.
effect_text_extend: Inflicts regular damage.  Power is doubled if the user's last move failed for any reason (i.e., produced the message "But it failed!") or was ineffective due to types.
effect_text_simple: Has double power if the user's last move failed.
